channel.title: My npc wont talk this is what I did!

item.title: My npc wont talk this is what I did!
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2994) { if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get Your rare stuff here"; } }

its hilarious that half of you forgot a second bracket … also make sure you aren’t adding it between any /* */

item.title: My npc wont talk this is what I did!
item.dc:creator: @viruz_3 viruz 3
item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

try this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2994) {
						if (misc.random(10)) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get your rare stuff here";
						}

Tell me if this works.

Read full topic

item.title: My npc wont talk this is what I did!
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

hi all, I added a npc and it won’t speak it went into npcHANDLER and put this in:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2994) if (misc.random2(5) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get Your rare stuff here"; }

but it didn’t work?

anyone no my problem?

James

Read full topic
